tool_description: Designs comprehensive evaluation matrices with scoring criteria and weightings for proposal assessment.

evaluation_categories.description: Main evaluation categories (e.g., technical, cost, experience)

total_points.description: Total points available in evaluation system

category_weights.description: Weight percentages for each category (must sum to 100)

error_messages: Category weight mismatch: Category weights must sum to exactly 100%.
Invalid point allocation: Total points must be a positive integer.
Missing evaluation categories: Provide at least one evaluation category.
Invalid threshold: Minimum score threshold must be between 0-100.
Weight array length error: Number of weights must match number of categories.
usage: Define evaluation categories, total points, and category weights. Optionally add subcriteria and pass/fail requirements. The tool creates a structured evaluation matrix for proposal scoring.

matrix_id.description: Unique identifier for the evaluation matrix

evaluation_instructions.description: Instructions for evaluators using the matrix
